stories.text:
Mentors have helped many of us succeed, and I want to create more opportunities to pay it forward. I have found supporting juniors very fulfilling. Are you interested in serving as a mentor? Are you ready to commit an hour a week to helping a junior?

Please comment with any stories about mentorship, requests, offers, etc. This is a temperature check before I set up something more formal.
stories.title: Ask HN: Interested in mentorship? Building community, paying it forward

stories.text: I’ve seen quite a bit of discussion on inflation, as a result of an increased supply of money in the system. Some have suggested that the stimulus checks increased the supply of money which may have, in part, led to inflation. I’m curious, if the government instituted a universal basic income, would this lead to inflation?
stories.title: Would a universal basic income lead to inflation?
